input_schema.description: A cat photograph to evaluate for light and environment — whether the lighting reveals the cat effectively and the background supports the subject without distraction.
A cat photograph to evaluate for lighting effectiveness — whether the light reveals the cat's features, fur, and form clearly and naturally.
A cat photograph to evaluate for background cleanliness and distraction level — whether the surrounding space supports the cat as the clear subject or competes with it for the viewer's attention.
A cat photograph to evaluate for overall harmony between subject and setting — whether light and environment work together to create a coherent, inviting visual experience.

description: Scores how well a cat photograph's lighting and environment serve the subject. Evaluates whether light reveals the cat clearly, the background stays calm and non-distracting, and light and setting work together harmoniously. Rewards functional visibility and visual cooperation over beauty or prestige of the setting.
